description: A Flutter widget named EmptyPlaceholder that displays a centered icon, title, and message, typically used as a placeholder when no content is available.

classes.name: EmptyPlaceholder
classes.description: A stateless widget that shows an icon, title, and message centered on the screen as a placeholder.
